{{Description|Upon returning to [[Mondstadt]], you encounter a light novelist. Following her script, you embark on a wondrous journey of reading and reverie...}}
'''Record of Reflective Writing''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 4.7]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2024/06/18 10:00 - 2024/06/24 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above
* Complete [[Archon Quest]] [[Chapter II]]: Act III "[[Omnipresence Over Mortals]]" first to get the best experience from this event.

===Summary===
* There are a total of 6 challenges and 2 new challenges will unlock each day for the first 3 days of the event. Complete the challenges to obtain [[Primogem]]s, [[Hero's Wit]], [[Talent Level-Up Material]]s, and other rewards.
* During the first five stages, Travelers will need to use the designated characters to complete the challenge. During the sixth stage, Travelers may choose two characters from among the designated characters to complete the challenge.
* Travelers will have to evade periodic incoming barrages from the mechanisms while collecting Labyrinth Coins during the allotted time. Collect Labyrinth Coins to gain points, Adventure Risk, and Risk Level. The higher the Risk Level, the greater the volume of incoming fire, and the more Labyrinth Coins that will appear.
* During each stage, Adventure Techniques can be used to assist you.
* Although there are no additional rewards for completing a given challenge with at least 1,000 points, a [[File:Specially-Shaped Saurian Search Medal Platinum.png|30px]] platinum medal will be shown on the results screen.

==Stages==
===I: First Contact: Direct Confrontation!===
Unlocks 2024-06-18 10{{Colon}}00
[[File:Record of Reflective Writing Stage 1.png|x150px|right|thumb]]
{{Description|Generally speaking, the mastermind often shows themselves right at the start of the story in order to show their strength to the protagonist. If you can take the enemy head-on with swift and fierce attacks, you'll be off to a great start and get a big morale boost...<br>{{Color|help|Use your combat abilities to attack enemies as much as possible and collect Labyrinth Coins.}}}}

;Available Character
{{Card|Clorinde}}

===II: Not Just Doublejumping?===
Unlocks 2024-06-18 10{{Colon}}00
[[File:Record of Reflective Writing Stage 2.png|x150px|right|thumb]]
{{Description|For some powerful fighters, if they can jump a second time while in midair, they can seize critical chances and turn the tide with a single move! And according to legend, some adepti are yet more powerful still...<br>{{Color|help|Use multi-stage jumps to collect Labyrinth Coins or dodge the incoming hail of bullets.}}}}

;Available Character
{{Card|Xianyun}}

===III: Cruisin' on a River of Lead===
Unlocks 2024-06-19 04{{Colon}}00
[[File:Record of Reflective Writing Stage 3.png|x150px|right|thumb]]
{{Description|The dashing figure cut by some heroes with their "Dodging Blitz" is their calling card. Perhaps for powerful warriors like them, an incoming curtain of bullets flying at them isn't much different from a cat taking a leisurely stroll along the road...<br>{{Color|help|Use rapid movement to agilely traverse between different platforms.}}}}

;Available Character
{{Card|Chiori}}

===IV: Gotta Go Fast~===
Unlocks 2024-06-19 04{{Colon}}00
[[File:Record of Reflective Writing Stage 4.png|x150px|right|thumb]]
{{Description|"Nimbly avoid attacks, and cross dangerous open spaces quickly": Such a difficult conundrum is enough to stop many Adventurers in their tracks and prevent them from entering the labyrinth. But those great warriors who are light on their feet can put their agility to good use...<br>{{Color|help|Use rapid movement abilities to move as quickly as possible, gathering Labyrinth Coins and dodging incoming fire.}}}}

;Available Character
{{Card|Yelan}}

===V: Flying is How I Dodge!===
Unlocks 2024-06-20 04{{Colon}}00
[[File:Record of Reflective Writing Stage 5.png|x150px|right|thumb]]
{{Description|Faced with withering assaults threatening to smack them right in the face, some particularly agile heroes will use bold vertical movements to dodge directly upwards, using the power of Anemo to "rise above" is a classic example of this brilliant move...<br>{{Color|help|Use leaping abilities to collect Labyrinth Coins and dodge the withering barrage.}}}}

;Available Character
{{Card|Kaedehara Kazuha}}

===VI: Mistbanisher: Thwart the Wicked Warlocks!===
Unlocks 2024-06-20 04{{Colon}}00
[[File:Record of Reflective Writing Stage 6.png|x150px|right|thumb]]
{{Description|Decisive showdowns have always been thrilling! The mastermind gives it their all, and there's no turning back: it's victory or death! The protagonist has to be flexible, and adapt to whatever is thrown at them, using the heroes most suitable for the current challenge, foiling the enemy plot, and gliding their way to victory...<br>{{Color|help|Choose two heroes and use their special abilities to collect Labyrinth Coins while dodging the curtain of bullets.}}}}

;Available Characters<ref group="Note">Two characters may be selected from the pool of available characters.</ref>
{{Card List|delim=;|Clorinde;Xianyun;Chiori;Yelan;Kaedehara Kazuha}}
